Name: Lee
Description: Lee's machinery expertise and extensive knowledge allows him to quickly react to unexpected situations.\nLee is able to utilize his outstanding <color=#ff3f3f>Arithmetic</color> capabilities to find optimal answers.

Name: Liv
Description: As a medic, Liv is very familiar with the ground surface, and has a better understanding of the behaviors and habits of other people.\nLiv's <color=#ff3f3f>Perception</color> allows her to better find clues left by others, which can be helpful in gathering information.

Name: Lucia
Description: Construct Lucia has outstanding physical and combat abilities. She can tackle any battle situation with ease.\nLucia performs particularly well in <color=#ff3f3f>Combat</color> missions. You can trust her when it comes to missions that involve potential conflicts or battles.

Name: Luna
Description: As an Ascendant, Luna's power is beyond limit in any aspect. She can single-handedly change the situation of a battle.\nWith the power to control Punishing Heteromers, Luna is an <color=#ff3f3f>all-rounder</color> Ascendant who can handle any possible situation.
